page.title: 19Local Industry
page.content: A General Engineering company, { {F.J.H. Ltd.,}was established 12 years ago in Faldingworth High Street. Steel structures are prepared for warehouses and hangers. Five people have been employed with extra work being sub-contracted. F.J.H. did the steel structure of the {Village Hall}but most of their work is on Humberside. On 1st Oct the company will become { {Engineering Services (Faldingworth)} with Mr.A.Jollands becoming sole owner. Down Spridlington Road Faldingworth there is {P.H.Dickinson Builders & {Joiners.}Mr.D Dickinson sees to the building side of the business, he employs one person. Mr.J Dickinson and his son deal with joinery work.
